short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Admire Sanji, with his signature skeletal detail at the mouth and golden yellow tones dominating the theme

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the fiery world of Sanji with this bold and stylish theme.

🎨 Minimalist Design: Featuring Sanji with a skeleton-like design on his mouth, surrounded by golden yellow tones, representing his strength, elegance, and the warmth of his character.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time with a display that matches Sanji’s passion and fiery spirit.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate swiftly to your favorite websites, with the same confidence and precision that Sanji brings to every fight.
🎮 Play Games: Engage in fun mini-games inspired by Sanji’s battles and his skills as a cook.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast, efficient searches, reflecting the sharpness and agility of Sanji.
🚀 More Extensions: Add features to elevate your browsing experience with the fire and precision of Sanji.
